data.eml:eml: Revision of the brachycistidine genus Colocistis Krombein, 1942 (Hymenoptera, Tiphiidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kimsey, Lynn S., Wasbauer, Marius S. (2013): Revision of the brachycistidine genus Colocistis Krombein, 1942 (Hymenoptera, Tiphiidae). Journal of Hymenoptera Research 33: 1-24, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/JHR.33.5078, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/JHR.33.5078
